alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 9:03PM MST until January 07 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Fredonia and Jacob Lake. * WHEN...Until noon MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will become nearly impossible on untreated roads due to snow and reduced visibility. * SNOW TABLES...Snow forecast from 11 PM Today to noon Sunday: Fredonia 4 to 6 inches Jacob Lake 5 to 9 inches.
info.instruction: If travel is essential, allow for extra drive time and use caution. For the latest road conditions and closures...call the ADOT freeway management system at 1 888 411 7623 or visit their web site at www.az511.com. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
